FuncDef:
The traffic-statistics enable command enables the traffic statistics collection function.
The undo traffic-statistics enable command disables the traffic statistics collection function.
By default, the traffic statistics collection function is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If you want to collect statistics about the traffic received or sent as a basis for VPN traffic monitoring or accounting, run the traffic-statistics enable command to enable the traffic statistics collection function.
After running the traffic-statistics enable command, you can use the display traffic-statistics vpn-instance command to view statistics about the traffic.
The reset traffic-statistics vpn-instance command can be used to clear the collected traffic statistics.
